title: Kalakshetra Foundation Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Consultant Posts
description: Kalakshetra Foundation has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Consultant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Sc, B.E/ B.Tech. can grab this chance and apply for the Kalakshetra Foundation Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. If you are...
